name: Virtual Romance Sim: Love City
description:
** Best love simulator game in 2019 **
Find your virtual boyfriend or girlfriend, fall in love and find loyalty in your virtual relationship!

Are you ready to fall in love with the person of your dreams? Yes, we mean that person you’re always thinking of and can’t keep away of your mind! Are you willing to feel butterflies again in your stomach? Do you really want to fight for what you love and don’t pretend to leave the love of your life? Are you looking for the true romantic love? Or maybe just some flirting? Do you want to think about what kind of plans you would like to do with that fantastic person? If it is yes the answer to some of this questions, then this is your love simulator game for sure!

This is your great opportunity to meet your other half and become the best possible virtual boyfriend or girlfriend. You will need to decide a bunch of different things in this game. From to whom you want to date with or where you are going to meet her/him until how are you going to dress up for the date and what kind of romantic plans you want to do with that person…. Dancing, walking, practicing some sports together, reading, taking pictures, doing some drawings or going to the latest romantic elegant restaurant… There is a lot of options! Just pick what you most like and be ready to impress him or her!

Basically in this fantastic simulation new game, you can be the cutest boy or girl in the whole town, as if you were living a kind of a second virtual life. Dress up with a bow and arrow and a pair of wings, and start spreading the love… Because you know, love is in the air!!
